title: OER-Based Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program: TAM-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and foundational understanding of OER (Open Educational Resources) concepts
context.additional_context: Microlearning content developed for smartphones, focusing on OER (Open Educational Resources) search, evaluation, and application skills.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to establish OER utilization strategies by applying the core elements of the TAM model (PEOU, PU, SE).
Learners will be able to simulate the process of exploring, evaluating, and applying OER resources in mobile environments.
Learners can design a collaborative system to share OER utilization cases with peer teachers via social media

resources: OER Utilization Case Study Video (Approx. 5 Minutes)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
